changes.change: - Fixed a bug where you still had same faction as you had in Caligor even after Caligor ends.
- Nerfed HP of Bushi King.
- Decreased cool time of all tattoos to 30 seconds.
- Changed buff of Pirate Lord title : There is 2 > 5% chance of getting additional box from World Boss.
- Hardcore Boxes will be stackable from now on.
- There's 30 seconds cooldown after using Family Summoning Horn from now on.
- Fixed a bug where you could be teleported to enemy base in act4.
- Fixed a bug that Valakus' Fire Sword Skin stats wasn't working properly.
- Fixed a bug where you could get wrong rewards from Battle Pass Reward 6 Box.
- Made that your player size will be smaller when you use Puppet Master's Bear Head. (For the people who got from auction.)
- Fixed a bug that $KickTower command wasn't working properly.
- Made that both sides will have EQUAL amount of members AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE.
- Made that people from same faction will see your messages but people from other faction won't see. (Same for family chat)
- Made that your faction will stay same even if you relog.
- Reduced movement speed by 1 in Arena.
- Level 4 quests has been replaced with the level 5.
- Changed Fairy Breath damage from 70% to 40%.
- Fixed a bug where you could get debuffs during Tumble.
- Fixed a bug that Pirate Lord title wasn't tradeable. (Done in db but we need to update launcher, will be done as soon as possible.)
- Decreased duration of Electric Shock from 4 to 3 seconds.
- Made that you won't get debuffs during Tumble.
- Made Pirate Lord title tradeable.
- Added Marto's Buff NPC on $Warp RaidArea.
- Increased chance of getting C55 equipments from P7 Raid Boxes. (Just a bit)
- Level 3 quests has been replaced with the level 4.
- Added Increase Overall specialist's skill by 3 to Karate Costume Wings [Not updated in visual]
- Reduced reflection from 7000 to 5000 on Moonlight Dragon Gem. [Not updated in visual]
- You will get 100x Family Tower Coins in total from now on.
- P.S : For the people who doesn't know, you can already sell Ancients/Auras to the NPC for 7KK.
[NEW] - New Valakus Weapon Skins added in Monthly Craft.
- Batman Mask is removed from craft.
- Caligor's Necklace, Conqueror's Flag, Broken Caligor's Horn & Butcher's Soul-Spirit materials removed from inventories.
- Monthly Quest is has been reseted.
- Increased amount of reputation you are getting from Rainbow Battle.
- Removed C55 Equipment Craft NPC, you will get C55 Weapons from Carno & C55 Armours from Kirollas raid from now on.
P.S : You can also sell C55 Equipments for 40KK to NPC.
- Fixed a bug that 2:35 Rainbow Battle was turning into Instant Combat.
- Fixed wrong typo of Prestige 6 Fish Map NPCs.
- Fixed Sidestep that had % on the wrong place in description.
- Fixed wrong amount of Dark Clones in Super Abracadabre description.
- Fixed wrong value in Cursed Sandstorm Raid quest.
-  Fixed bug in Mental Poison description where you could see 'All attacks are increased' instead of decreased.
- Fixed wrong value in Berserker buff about movement speed (side effect).
- Fixed Claw Hold description where you could see causing of wrong debuff.
- Fixed wrong effect in Final Flame description.
- Fixed bug in Dark Knight's Helmet description where you could see 'The chance of receiving a critical hit is increased' instead of decreased.
- Fixed bug in Honeybee description where you could see Magic attack instead of Magic defence.
- Fixed bug in Shadow King's Helmet description where you could see 'The chance of receiving a critical hit is increased' instead of decreased.
- Fixed Holy Shield buff in visual.
- Extra World Bosses are removed from the schedule.
- Level 2 quests has been replaced with the level 3.
- Removed Light resistances are increased by 2 from Nutcracker Uniform.
- Removed Carno Raid seal from Prestige 6 Raid Seal NPC.
- Added Prestige 4 World Boss to 11.00 and 00.10 schedules. (Only for today)
- Removed Light resistances are increased by 2 from Nutcracker Uniform.
- Removed All resistances are increased by 17 from Orc Gloves in visual.
- Removed Shadow from second version Long-Legged Spider's Blessing Buff name.
- Removed Shadow from second version Devil Vampie's Blessing Buff name.
- Removed Shadow from second version Master Bunny's Blessing Buff name.
- Removed Fatal Burn from Hellfire skill in visual.
- Fixed that Material (the one your getting to craft prestige) was showing as different name on chat.
- Fixed that Caligor Box had wrong name in visual. (Was showing as winner box for both side.)
- Fixed Cool Times of Creation, Kiss & Call for the Koala Help skills in visual.
- Fixed that Death Approaches skill had wrong values in visual.
- Fixed that Cannon Shot skill had wrong values in visual.
- Fixed that Intense Cold skill had wrong values in visual.
- Fixed that Ice Chain skill had wrong values in visual.
- Fixed duration of Lupine Vision buff in visual.
- Growth Shield (Holy Shield)
* Added: Magic defence is increased by 200.
* Added: Remove bad effect below level 4.
- Removed Black Gemstone drop from monsters.
- Fixed a bug that it was showing some people twice in family list.
- You will get 0 sum Orc Resistances from Reputation Shop again.
- Level 1 quests has been replaced with the level 2.
- Fixed a bug that it was showing some people twice in family list.
- Changed Chance of inflicting critical hits is increased by 5% to 3% on Tropical Costume Wings.
- Increased amount of perfections you are getting from Small & Perfection Boxes. (Prestige 7 Fishing Area)
- Removed confirmation message while using Ancelloan's Blessing & Fairy Booster.
- Fixed a bug that it was showing some people twice in family list.
- New Battle Pass Season is added in NosVoid Mall.
- Fixed a bug that $TowerKick command wasn't working.
- Removed Kill Streak & Death Counter from shout, you will see your KDA in corner. (in arena)
- Changed Movement speed is increased by 1 to Your specialist's overall skill points are increased by 3. on Tropical Costume Wings.
- Removed confirmation message while using Ancient Medal of Honour.
- Maru Raid Boxes are droppable from now on.
- Fixed a visual bug that buff NPCs had wrong amount of the gold.
- Fixed a bug that you couldn't see Snorkelling Set wasn't visible into inventory.
- Fixed description of Gold Potion.
- Fixed a bug that Reduces cooldown buff wasn't working properly on Sailing Costume
- Fixed a bug that Daily Paimon family mission wasn't working.
- Fixed $warp FarmArea command.
- $TowerKick command is available for Family Leader & Co-Leader..
- $Warp FarmArea command is added.
- Removed Sword of Justice 1 combo from Archer SP8.
- Removed Arena Death Score from NosVoid Website Ranking.
- Fixed description of Gold Potion.
- After successful rarify using auto bet, shell info window pops up by itself.
- Fixed description of Gold Potion.
Range Boost :
* Cool Time: 35sec => 30 sec
- Ultimate Cannon :
* There's a 75% chance of causing The Great Explosive Shockwave => 70%
* Target : Around Enemy in 3 cell => 4 cell
- Extreme Paralysis debuff :
* Movement speed is decreased by 6 => 4
- Magma Plating :
* Duration: 8 sec => 10 sec
* Deleted: The effect ends if you take damage from enemies
* Side effect after 0.1 sec: Movement Speed is increased by 2 => 1
- Magma Shield :
* Added: Movement speed is increased by 1.
- Reignition :
* Cool Time: 90 sec => 30 sec
- Dark Dash :
* Movement speed is increased by 11 => 7

- Master Bunny Pet : The probability of catching a fish is increased by 5% => The probability of catching a fish is increased by 10%. There's a 10% chance of catching a bigger fish => There's a 15% chance of catching a bigger fish.

- Shadow Master Bunny Pet : The probability of catching a fish is increased by 10% => The probability of catching a fish is increased by 20%. There's a 20% chance of catching a bigger fish => There's a 30% chance of catching a bigger fish. There's 50% chance to not consume a fish bait => There's 60% chance to not consume a fish bait. The fishing experience points you receive are increased by 10% => The fishing experience points you receive are increased by 20%. Added: Gold Received by selling fish at npc is increased by 15%.
- Removed confirmation when you use Reputation Medal & Ice Flower Oil.
- Fixed a bug that McFluffy had wrong speed.
- Added Tower-Group letter in Family Tower Rewards NPC. You will be able to go in tower with 2 people from now on.
- Fixed description of Gold Potion.
- Changed amount of family spots to 150 for the families with 7+ level.
- Removed Increase Spot items from NosVoid Shop, Crafts and Inventories.
- You will be able to get S6 Orc Resistances from Reputation Shop for 100k Reputation. [Available for 1 weeks]
- Removed all resistances increased by 17 buff from Orc Resistances
- Fixed description of Gold Potion.
